channel.title: Mod, lock or remove please
channel.description: Mod, please just lock or remove. I only gave myself 1% credits, and yet still get flamed..

item.title: Mod, lock or remove please
item.dc:creator: @rune-pure rune-pure
item.description:
@rune-pure wrote:

[quote=“gunz4life, post:13, topic:287228”][quote author=rune-pure link=topic=379819.msg2855818#msg2855818 date=1246839569]

Lets rename credits…

Kihoumura-99%
Tuts-1%
You-0%

So your giving your self 5% for adding a tutorial on how to change the loading box to the top?

Its a leech.

Don’t be mean, its probably his first client, i’m 99% if you even release something other then go around saying stuff like “Omg its leeched!” maybe you’ll see everyones 1st server/client is probably leeched (most people…)

If its your first client do a good job, don’t be a douche and leech it.

[/quote]
Actually most people atleast 90% of this community 1st release server/client was leeched because they was new and didn’t know how code, don’t come on this topic if you got all negative comments to bring other people down… because I’m sure you wouldn’t like it.[/quote]

If you don’t know how to code learn how, a few hours a day? Doesn’t take long, so these douches just sit on there fat UN educated asses and copy stuff for fame.

Read full topic

item.title: Mod, lock or remove please
item.dc:creator: @rune-pure rune-pure
item.description:
@rune-pure wrote:

[quote=“r34p4g3pk, post:8, topic:287228”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=379819.msg2855816#msg2855816 date=1246839524]
I like your credits… You did a good job. It can be helpful for some, ignore those other people.
[/quote]Theres tutorials for what he did on R00N S3RV3r. Don’t see anything that you did by yourself, but good job for tthe attempt.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2009, 06:22:48 pm[/size][hr][quote author=rune-pure link=topic=379819.msg2855818#msg2855818 date=1246839569]

Lets rename credits…

Kihoumura-99%
Tuts-1%
You-0%

So your giving your self 5% for adding a tutorial on how to change the loading box to the top?

Its a leech.

Don’t be mean, its probably his first client, i’m 99% if you even release something other then go around saying stuff like “Omg its leeched!” maybe you’ll see everyones 1st server/client is probably leeched (most people…)

If its your first client do a good job, don’t be a douche and leech it.

[/quote]If it’s your first tutorial you should try your best, you sir are being the douche by discriminating his first client.[/quote]

You sir are a idiot.

A new coder in my eyes is someone who trys his best, who fill code to his full extent, even if its shit.

Leeching is another thing, even if your new, you leech, you get flamed.

Read full topic
